rules_text:
Harbinger of Darkness's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
Mount {1}{B}{B} [i]({1}{B}{B}: Pair this creature with another unpaired creature you control. That creature becomes this creature's rider. This creature can't attack or block as long as it has a rider. Mount only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Harbinger of Darkness's rider gets +X/+X, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
